sentences.english: And the optimum decoloring conditions for P. vulgaris polysaccharide was determined through orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 通過正交試驗確定了夏枯草多糖脫色的最佳條件。

sentences.english: Extracts from the bacterium B. brevis contain a peptide with antibiotic properties.
sentences.chinese: 枯草桿菌提取物中含一種具有抗生素性質的肽。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the content of ursolic acid in Prunella vulgaris L.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定夏枯草中熊果酸的含量。

sentences.english: Your eyes are lifeless, your face is ashen, hair loss.
sentences.chinese: 兩眼無神，面色灰暗，發如枯草。

sentences.english: Provide the analysis of Prunella vulgaris with most meaningful information.
sentences.chinese: 對進一步分析夏枯草活性成分提供有意義的參考信息。

sentences.english: A mutant of B. subtilis 168 mutagenized with NG.
sentences.chinese: 用NG誘變枯草桿菌168所得的一個突變型。

sentences.english: There was little to see around the ancient road except yellow sand, withered grasses and the occasional crow flying homewards.
sentences.chinese: 古道無他物，除卻黃沙枯草和偶爾幾聲烏鴉歸巢。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determining the content of oleanolic acid and ursolic acid in Prunella vulgaris .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立夏枯草中齊墩果酸和熊果酸的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The dried grass stood up sharply as if cooper teels.
sentences.chinese: 枯草支支直立，有如銅絲。

sentences.english: Selfheals can help removing heat and toxic elements inside the body. It also helps to remove eye soreness in summer time.
sentences.chinese: 夏枯草清熱解毒，在夏日對眼睛赤疼有較好食療作用。

sentences.english: The shell of spore of Bacillus subtilis var. niger was blurred and swollen.
sentences.chinese: 枯草桿菌黑色變種芽孢外殼模糊腫脹。

sentences.english: ConclusionThis method can be served as a quality control method for Prunella vulgaris L.
sentences.chinese: 結論該方法可用於夏枯草的質量控制。

sentences.english: The breeze swayed a few dry weeds on the crest of the wall, and they gave out a faint, sweet, melancholy sound.
sentences.chinese: 牆頭上幾根枯草在風中發出稍微悽楚的聲音。

sentences.english: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 枯草熱是年紀較小時會患的一種病。

sentences.english: This method can be used in the quality analysis of Prunella vulgaris L.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可作爲夏枯草的質量分析。

sentences.english: I am withered , dried up like grass, too wasted to eat my food.
sentences.chinese: 我的心憔悴得象枯草一般，因此我也忘記了喫我的飯。
